Name: Furry Shakespeare: Two Incredibly Ripped, Absolutely Shredded Noble Kinsmen
About the game: The State of the Elsinorian Empire King Theseus and his sister, Hippolyta, have ruled the great Elsinore Empire for over a decade. But now it is time to pass the torch. Or is it? In a brash move, King Theseus throws in his hat for re-election! The Two Noble Kinsmen After winning the war with Thebes, King Theseus has nominated two of his rival's champions for the Thebian throne - but one of them wants more than that! Politically-minded Rax wants a war of wits as well as swords! A truly deadly debate! Politics and Choices! Follow the exploits of Theseus' campaign staff as they try to survive! Every choice affects one of 10+ story variables! Visual Novel with branching paths! Who will be elected the new Emperor of Elsinore? Or will you just straight-up overthrow the monarchy? Break campaign promises?
